thread.title: Big Air: Either the Best or Worst Thing for Snowboarding

author: Brian Costa
title: Big Air: Either the Best or Worst Thing for Snowboarding
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—The newest Olympic snowboarding event will send competitors higher in the air than ever before. It requires no mountain, little snow and, for spectators, no familiarity with the nuances of the sport.
It’s called big air, and it is either the best thing or the worst thing for the future of snowboarding.
